title: Software Engineer Intern
text: Pros They were a very organized organization. Despite of being a small company, everything was serious and well done. It gave me the chance to improve my back-end development skills as well as front-end and testing skills. Cons They were not much support. When I got stuck in a problem, I should've figured it out myself most of the times.
pros: They were a very organized organization. Despite of being a small company, everything was serious and well done.
cons: They were not much support. When I got stuck in a problem, I should've figured it out myself most of the times.
